section.name: Introduction
section.p: Spice is a repository of Components which support Component Oriented Programming (COP) paradigms - in particular, the Inversion of Control (IoC) design pattern.

Our aim is to developed components that are:
highly reusable - leveraging on IoC
deployable both in client and server containers
well tested - with high unit test coverage

section.name: Multi-Container support
section.p: The Components are designed to support deployment in different containers or frameworks.

subsection.name: JContainer Loom
subsection.p: Avalon Framework supports Inversion of Control (IoC), via a set of interfaces (sometimes called type-1 IoC).
The JContainer Loom is a container designed and implemented on top of the Avalon Framework.

subsection.name: JContainer DNA
subsection.p: JContainer DNA is another framework supporting type-1 IoC.

subsection.name: PicoContainer
subsection.p: Pico Container supports IoC in a more agile and embeddable way, without the need to import any external interface or class (sometimes called type-3).
The components which are Pico-compatible will display the logo .
